content: need a quick project or a last minute gift idea this simple and fast coaster pattern whips up in no time it s very beginner friendly and if you re just starting out it s a great way to practice your gauge while learning skills like counting row and stitches after the chain it s only one stitch throughout > join the sweet bee crochet facebook > community share project photos ask questions and connect with fellow crocheters we d love to have you click here 1 **materials needed ** - approximately 27 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn per coaster i used wecrochet dishie in the begonia colourway - 4mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
